messages.content: You are an expert gymnastics coach.
Create a 50-minute gymnastics practice plan for advanced beginner girls. They have trampoline, floor, and bars.

## 50-Minute Advanced Beginner Girls Practice Plan: ### Warm Up (3 min): - 10 jumping jacks - Pike stand - Pike sit - Pointed toes - Flexed toes - Straddle sit - Reach for left leg - Reach for right leg - Reach in middle - Shoulder stretch - Bridge with 10 rocks and 10 kicks --- ### Trampoline (12 minutes): Set up stations before class starts. Each station will last approximately 3 minutes before switching to the next station | **Station** | **Equipment** | **Execution** | **Focus** | |------------------|----------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| | Plank bounces | Trampoline | - Get in pushup position on trampoline
- Squeeze tummy and glutes
- Push through shoulders and wrists to bounce (do not bend arms)
- Do 10 or more bounces connected | - Body tension
- Micromovements | | Tuck up Holds | Floor space
Pit block | - Hold legs off the floor in a tucked position
- Hold back off floor in a straight
- Balance pit block on shins
- Hold for 30 seconds | - Strength
- Balance | | Swivel Hips | Trampoline | - Jump
- Seat drop
- Half turn
- Seat drop
- Try to connect multiples | - Connect movements without touching feet
- Keep legs straight and together
- Have a straight body and arms by ears while turning | | Incline Push Ups | Floor space
P-Bar block | - Feet on floor
- Hands on block with straight arms
- Bend arms until chest touches block
- Straighten arms
- Do 10 or more connected | - Strength
- Body shape | --- #### Floor Exercise (15 minutes): Allow 3 minutes to set up and explain stations. Each station will last approximately 3 minutes before switching to the next station | **Station** | **Equipment** | **Execution** | **Focus** | |--------------------------------|----------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| | Passé Relevé Half Turn | Two Hula Hoops | - Prep for turn with weight on non-dominant leg in one hoop and dominant leg pointed into second hoop
- Step onto dominant leg on tip toes (Relevé)
- Non-dominant foot goes to knee of dominate leg (Passé)
- Turn to face other direction
- Step back into first hoop on non-dominant foot | - Body position
- Balance | | Handstand to bridge, kick over | Wedge | - Kick to handstand with hand at bottom of wedge
- Fold over to bridge with feet at top of wedge
- Kick over | - Hold handstand before bridge
- Push strong through legs when landing in bridge
- Legs straight on kick over | | Backbend | Wedge | - Stand at bottom, facing away from wedge
- Arms by ears, watch hands and bend backwards into bridge with hands at top of wedge | - Push strong through arms when landing in bridge | | Jump Arabesque | Panel Mat | - Start on floor with feet together, face panel mat
- Bend legs slightly and jump onto panel mat
- Land on dominant leg, with non-dominant leg held behind in arabesque | - Back leg straight
- Front leg slightly bent
- Hold back leg at 45 degrees or higher | --- **Bars(15 minutes)** Allow 3 minutes to set up and explain stations. Each station will last approximately 3 minutes before switching to the next station | **Station** | **Equipment** | **Execution** | **Focus** | |---------------------------|-----------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| | Back hip circles | Bar | - Start in front support with hollow body
- Three small casts
- Rotate backwards around bar
- Land back in front support | - Body control
- Legs together and straight
- Rotate hands around bar without turning wrists around | | Forward roll to chin hold | Bar | - Start in front support with hollow body
- Lean forward over bar
- Shift hands around the bar
- Flip over bar
- Hold chin at bar
- Try to have feet land quietly | - Body control
- Legs together and straight
- Rotate hands around bar without turning wrists around | | Tuck Ins | Bar
Barrel | - Hold pushup position with hands on bar and feet on barrel
- Ensure shoulders are over the bar
- Pull knees into tuck position, rolling barrel to achieve | - Body position
- Pushing down on bar
- Bringing feet to the bar with back horizontal for squat ons | | Push Up Jacks | Floor Bar
Two Panel Mats | - Set up panel mats and bar like a channel bar
- Hold pushup position with hands on bar and feet on floor
- Ensure shoulders are over the bar
- Jump feet apart onto panel mats and back together.
- Connect 10 or more together | - Body position
- Pushing down on bar
- Squeeze tummy | --- **Free Time/Conditioning (5 minutes)** Set up an obstacle course jumping on and over mats, rolls, and balancing. Continue to run through until time is up.
You are an expert gymnastics coach.
Create a 50-minute gymnastics practice plan for advanced beginner girls. They have vault, floor, and beam.

## 50-Minute Advanced Beginner Girls Practice Plan ### Warm Up (3 min): - 10 jumping jacks - Pike stand - Pike sit - Pointed toes - Flexed toes - Straddle sit - Reach for left leg - Reach for right leg - Reach in middle - Shoulder stretch - Bridge with 10 rocks and 10 kicks --- ### Vault (12 minutes): Set up stations before class starts. Each station will last approximately 3 minutes before switching to the next station. | **Station** | **Equipment** | **Execution** | **Focus** | |----------------------------------|------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------| | Running Dive Rolls | Resi, Wedge, T-Trainer | - Set up wedge on top of resi
- Run and jump on T-Trainer
- Jump up and roll down wedge | - Fast run
- Jump with feet together
- Jump up to be able to roll | | Handstand to bridge holds | Floor space, Landing Mat | - Kick to handstand
- Fold over to bridge | - Hold handstand before bridge
- Push strong through legs when landing in bridge | | Straight Jumps | Spring board, P-bar block | - Run
- Jump with feet together
- Straight jump onto block | - Jump with feet together
- Body control
- Jumping high | | Handstand holds against blocks | Floor space, Two P-Bar blocks | - Stack p-bar blocks
- Kick up to handstand with back against blocks
- Hold handstand for as long as possible | - Strength
- Body shape
- Balance | --- ### Floor Exercise (15 minutes): Allow 3 minutes to set up and explain stations. Each station will last approximately 3 minutes before switching to the next station. | **Station** | **Equipment** | **Execution** | **Focus** | |--------------------------------|---------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------------------------------| | Passé Relevé Holds | Wall | - Step onto dominant leg on tip toes (Relevé)
- Non-dominant foot goes to knee of dominant leg (Passé)
- Balance with hands and bent knee against wall
- Hold for 30 seconds | - Body position
- Balance | | Handstand to bridge, kick over | Ninja block | - Kick to handstand with hands on floor.
- Fold over to bridge with feet at top of ninja block
- Kick over | - Hold handstand before bridge
- Push strong through legs when landing in bridge
- Legs straight on kick over | | Headstand | Floor Space | - Start with tripod and work up to extending legs
- Hold for as long as possible | - Core strength
- Balance | | Round off to knees | 8-inch mat | - Small run optional
- Step into round off with hands on the floor in front of mat
- Land with legs together on knees on top of mat, hollow body, and arms by ears. | - Land facing the correct direction
- Legs come together before landing
- Push hard off arms to be able to sit up
- Squeeze tummy and glutes on landing | --- ### Beam (15 minutes): Allow 3 minutes to set up and explain stations. Each station will last approximately 3 minutes before switching to the next station. | **Station** | **Equipment** | **Execution** | **Focus** | |----------------------------------|--------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------------| | Levers | High beam, Noodle | - Start in lunge with arms by ears, holding noodle
- Lean over lifting back leg, keep a straight line from hands to back foot
- Touch noodle to beam
- Stand back up to lunge | - Body control
- Balance | | Straight jump, split jump | High beam | - Straight jump with arms by ears
- Split jumps with arms to the side | - Sharp movements
- Balance
- Connect skills | | Squat turns | Low beam | - Stand in a lock step
- Squat down with arms by ears
- Pivot turn while in squat
- Stand back up | - Body position
- Balance | | Handstand | Low beam | - Start in lunge with arms by ears
- Lever into handstand
- Touch feet together
- Stand back up, finishing in lunge | - Body position
- Balance
- Squeeze tummy | --- ### Free Time/Conditioning (5 minutes) Play red light, green light.
You are an expert gymnastics coach.
Create a 90-minute gymnastics practice plan for intermediate girls. They have vault, floor, and beam.

# 90-Minute Practice Plan for Vault, Floor, and Beam **Skill Level:** Intermediate **Gender:** Girls --- ## Warm Up (6 min) - **Tumbl Trak:** Straight, Tuck, Straddle, Pike, Split (alternating), Full turns, Donkey kicks, Donkey kicks with handstand hops, Bounders - **Exercises:** - 10 jumping jacks - Pike stand - **Pike sit:** Pointed toes, Flexed toes - **Straddle sit:** Reach for left leg, Reach for right leg, Reach in middle - Shoulder stretch - Bridge with 10 rocks and 10 kicks --- ## Vault (24 minutes) Each station lasts approximately **6 minutes**. | **Station** | **Equipment** | **Execution** | **Focus** | |----------------------------------|-----------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------| | Straight Jump, Front Handspring | Vault table, T-Trainer | - Run
- Straight jump onto table
- Front handspring off | - Fast run
- Jump with feet together | | Shoulder Blocks | Wall, 12-inch mat | - Step
- Arm circle
- Reach for wall
- Lift feet as hands touch wall
- Block off wall
- Land on stomach | - Block through shoulders and wrists
- Body position | | Handstand Smashdown | Resi, Springboard, Small wedge | - Set small wedge between springboard and resi to force gymnast to stand up off the board
- Run
- Jump with feet together
- Drive heels and land in handstand
- Fall onto back keeping hollow body | - Jump with feet together
- Body control
- Heel drive | | Handstand Holds Against Blocks | Floor space, Two P-Bar blocks | - Stack p-bar blocks
- Kick up to handstand with back against blocks
- Hold handstand for as long as possible | - Strength
- Body shape
- Balance | --- ## Floor Exercise (30 minutes) **Setup Time:** 3 minutes Each station lasts approximately **6 minutes**. | **Station** | **Equipment** | **Execution** | **Focus** | |---------------------------|---------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------------------| | Press Handstand | Wall | - Start in straddle stand
- Place hands on floor
- Lean shoulders against the wall
- Roll up on toes and lift legs
- Straddle up to handstand | - Strength
- Body position
- Balance | | Handstand Snapdown | Panel mat, Wall | - Handstand with hands on panel mat, slight arch until feet touch wall
- Snap feet down and push off panel mat
- Rebound onto panel mat with arms by ears | - Snap legs down at the same time
- Push strong through shoulders in handstand
- Body position | | Arabesque Hops, Leap | Floor space, Panel mat | - Hop on dominant leg three times while holding non-dominant leg in arabesque
- Step on non-dominant leg
- Leap onto panel mat, landing on dominant leg | - Body position
- Balance | | Round Off Scoops | Panel mat, Pit | - Small run and hurdle
- Round off with hands on panel mat
- Block off hands
- Scoop feet and land on back in pit | - Block hard off mat to be able to land on back
- Keep legs together during scoop
- Keep hollow body during scoop | --- ## Beam (25 minutes) **Setup Time:** 3 minutes Each station lasts approximately **5.5 minutes**. | **Station** | **Equipment** | **Execution** | **Focus** | |---------------------------|------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------| | Handstand Pops | High beam | - Start in lunge with arms by ears
- Complete lever and pop dominant foot off beam
- Land back on beam
- Stand back up to lunge | - Body control
- Balance | | Cartwheel | Laser beam, Two blocks | - Set blocks on either side of laser beam on the same end of the beam
- Start in a lunge between the blocks
- Cartwheel out of the blocks
- Land in lunge | - Body control
- Balance
- Kicking over the top | | Straight Jump, Split Jump | High beam | - Straight jump with arms by ears
- Split jumps with arms to the side | - Sharp movements
- Balance
- Connect skills | | Round Off Dismount | High beam | - Start in lunge with arms by ears
- Kick into round off with hands at end of the beam
- Land with feet together | - Body position
- Balance
- Squeeze tummy
- Kick over the top | --- ## Free Time/Conditioning (5 minutes) - Play **Color Tag**
You are an expert gymnastics coach.
Create a 50-minute gymnastics practice plan for intermediate girls. They have vault, bars, and floor.

## 50-Minute Intermediate Girls Practice Plan ### Warm Up (5 min): - 10 jumping jacks - Arm circles forward and backward - Pike stretch - Straddle stretch - Shoulder stretch - Bridge with 10 rocks and 10 kicks --- ### Vault (12 minutes): Set up stations before class starts. Each station will last approximately 3 minutes before switching to the next station. | **Station** | **Equipment** | **Execution** | **Focus** | |-------------------------|-----------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------| | Sprint Drills | Vault runway | - Fast, high knee run
- Arm drive coordination | - Proper running technique | | Hurdle to Handstand | Wedge, vault table | - Run, hurdle onto springboard
- Kick to handstand on wedge
- Control fall to back on mat | - Power in hurdle
- Handstand control | | Handstand Flatbacks | Vault table, mat | - Run, hurdle onto springboard
- Handstand on vault table
- Fall back onto mat | - Handstand shape
- Safe landing | | Block Jumps | Springboard, block | - Jump onto block with feet together
- Stick landing | - Body control
- Leg power | --- ### Bars (15 minutes): Allow 3 minutes to set up and explain stations. Each station will last approximately 3 minutes before switching to the next station. | **Station** | **Equipment** | **Execution** | **Focus** | |-----------------------|-----------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------| | Kipping Drills | Bar, resistance band | - Pull to hollow hang
- Kip swings with resistance band | - Core and shoulder engagement | | Cast to Handstand | Bar | - Start in front support
- Small casts building up to handstand | - Core control
- Arm push strength | | Glide Swings | Low bar | - Hollow body swing
- Extend legs forward and backward | - Swing technique
- Core engagement | | Tap Swings | High bar | - Swing with controlled hollow-to-arch transitions | - Rhythm
- Shoulder extension | --- ### Floor Exercise (15 minutes): Allow 3 minutes to set up and explain stations. Each station will last approximately 3 minutes before switching to the next station. | **Station** | **Equipment** | **Execution** | **Focus** | |----------------------------|---------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------| | Handstand Step-Downs | Wall | - Kick up to handstand
- Control step down one foot at a time | - Core strength
- Balance | | Front Walkovers | Wedge | - Kick to handstand
- Bridge down and step out | - Controlled descent
- Strong leg push | | Back Handspring Drills | Panel mat | - Sit back into hollow jump
- Push through shoulders
- Snap legs over | - Fast snapdown
- Arm coordination | | Press Handstand Holds | Floor | - Pike or straddle press to handstand
- Hold for as long as possible | - Shoulder strength
- Core balance | --- ### Conditioning & Cool Down (5 minutes) - 10 V-ups - 10 Push-ups - 10 Squats - Shoulder stretch - Pike stretch - Deep breathing exercises --- ## 50-Minute Intermediate Girls Practice Plan (Alternate) ### Warm Up (5 min): - 10 high knees - 10 butt kicks - Side lunges - Bridge hold for 10 seconds - Pike stretch - Arm swings --- ### Vault (12 minutes): | **Station** | **Equipment** | **Execution** | **Focus** | |-------------------------|-----------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------| | Sprint Technique | Vault runway | - Short sprint with resistance band | - Drive power through legs | | Hurdle to Dive Roll | Springboard, mat | - Run, hurdle onto springboard
- Dive roll onto mat | - Hurdle height
- Forward rotation | | Arm Drive Drills | Springboard | - Jump onto springboard
- Swing arms aggressively | - Upper body coordination | | Stick Landing Drill | Block, floor | - Jump off block, land in stuck position | - Landing stability | --- ### Bars (15 minutes): | **Station** | **Equipment** | **Execution** | **Focus** | |-----------------------|-----------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------| | Kip Strength | Low bar, resistance band | - Pull to tuck hang
- Kip drills with bands | - Core engagement
- Arm power | | Cast to Dismount | High bar | - Cast, then push off bar into safe dismount | - Cast height
- Landing control | | Glide Kip Prep | Low bar | - Glide swing, knees to chest, push up | - Kip mechanics
- Core stability | | Grip Strength | Rope or bar | - Hang for 20 seconds
- Switch grips mid-hang | - Hand and wrist strength | --- ### Floor Exercise (15 minutes): | **Station** | **Equipment** | **Execution** | **Focus** | |----------------------------|---------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------| | Handstand Walks | Floor | - Walk on hands for distance | - Balance
- Upper body control | | Roundoff Drills | Wedge | - Roundoff over wedge, snap down | - Power
- Footwork coordination | | Aerial Prep Drills | Panel mat | - Cartwheel with minimal hand support | - Leg drive
- Spatial awareness | | Jump Combinations | Floor | - Tuck jump, straddle jump, split jump sequence | - Leg power
- Body control | --- ### Conditioning & Cool Down (5 minutes) - 15 Hollow body rocks - 10 Dips - 10 Single leg squats - Shoulder stretch - Deep breathing exercises
You are an expert gymnastics coach.
Create a 120-minute gymnastics practice plan for advanced girls. They have all four events.

## 120-Minute Advanced Girls Practice Plan: ### Warm Up (10 minutes): - 15 jumping jacks - Arm circles forward and backward - Wrist and ankle rolls - Pike stretch - Straddle stretch - Shoulder mobility drills - Bridge with 15 rocks and 15 kicks --- ### Vault (20 minutes): Set up stations before class starts. Each station will last approximately 5 minutes before switching to the next station. | **Station** | **Equipment** | **Execution** | **Focus** | |------------------------|-----------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------| | Sprint Drills | Vault runway | - High knee run
- Powerful arm drive | Acceleration and speed | | Hurdle to Handstand | Wedge, vault table | - Run, hurdle onto springboard
- Kick to handstand on wedge | Hurdle power, Handstand control | | Handstand Flatbacks | Vault table, mat | - Run, hurdle onto springboard
- Handstand on vault table
- Fall back onto mat | Handstand shape, Safe landing | | Block Jumps | Springboard, block | - Jump onto block with feet together
- Stick landing | Leg power, Stability | --- ### Bars (30 minutes): Set up stations before class starts. Each station will last approximately 7.5 minutes before switching to the next station. | **Station** | **Equipment** | **Execution** | **Focus** | |------------------------|-----------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------| | Kip Progressions | Bar, resistance band | - Pull to hollow hang
- Kip swings with resistance band | Core and shoulder strength | | Cast to Handstand | Bar | - Start in front support
- Small casts building to handstand | Core control, Arm push strength | | Tap Swings | High bar | - Swing with controlled hollow-to-arch transitions | Swing rhythm, Shoulder extension | | Giant Prep | Straps, high bar | - Controlled hollow swing
- Tap under the bar | Upper body control, Tap timing | --- ### Beam (30 minutes): Set up stations before class starts. Each station will last approximately 7.5 minutes before switching to the next station. | **Station** | **Equipment** | **Execution** | **Focus** | |------------------------|-----------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------| | Leaps and Jumps | Beam | - Split jumps, Straddle jumps, Switch leaps | Leg extension, Split height | | Handstand Drills | Beam | - Kick to handstand, Hold position | Balance, Core engagement | | Dismount Progressions | Beam, mat | - Round-off dismounts, Stick landings | Body control, Landing technique | | Turns and Holds | Beam | - Full turns, Scale holds | Control, Precision | --- ### Floor (30 minutes): Set up stations before class starts. Each station will last approximately 7.5 minutes before switching to the next station. | **Station** | **Equipment** | **Execution** | **Focus** | |------------------------|-----------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------| | Handstand Step-Downs | Wall | - Kick up to handstand
- Control step down one foot at a time | Core strength, Balance | | Front Handsprings | Panel mat | - Lunge, Reach, Punch through shoulders | Power, Arm coordination | | Back Handspring Drills | Floor | - Sit back into hollow jump
- Snap legs over | Fast snapdown, Arm coordination | | Tumbling Passes | Spring floor | - Round-off back handspring, Layout step-out | Flow, Execution | --- ### Conditioning & Cool Down (10 minutes): - 15 V-ups - 15 Push-ups - 15 Squats - Shoulder stretch - Pike stretch - Deep breathing exercises
You are an expert gymnastics coach.
Create a 50-minute gymnastics practice plan for advanced girls.

## 50-Minute Advanced Recreational Girls Practice Plan ### Warm Up (5 minutes): - 10 jumping jacks - Arm circles forward and backward - Pike stretch - Straddle stretch - Shoulder stretch - Bridge with 10 rocks and 10 kicks --- ### Vault (12 minutes): Set up stations before class starts. Each station will last approximately 3 minutes before switching to the next station. | **Station** | **Equipment** | **Execution** | **Focus** | |------------------------|-----------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------| | Sprint Drills | Vault runway | - Fast, high knee run
- Arm drive coordination | Proper running technique | | Hurdle to Handstand | Wedge, vault table | - Run, hurdle onto springboard
- Kick to handstand on wedge
- Control fall to back on mat | Power in hurdle, Handstand control | | Handstand Flatbacks | Vault table, mat | - Run, hurdle onto springboard
- Handstand on vault table
- Fall back onto mat | Handstand shape, Safe landing | | Block Jumps | Springboard, block | - Jump onto block with feet together
- Stick landing | Body control, Leg power | --- ### Bars (15 minutes): Set up stations before class starts. Each station will last approximately 3.75 minutes before switching to the next station. | **Station** | **Equipment** | **Execution** | **Focus** | |------------------------|-----------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------| | Kip Progressions | Bar, resistance band | - Pull to hollow hang
- Kip swings with resistance band | Core and shoulder engagement | | Cast to Handstand | Bar | - Start in front support
- Small casts building up to handstand | Core control, Arm push strength | | Glide Swings | Low bar | - Hollow body swing
- Extend legs forward and backward | Swing technique, Core engagement | | Tap Swings | High bar | - Swing with controlled hollow-to-arch transitions | Rhythm, Shoulder extension | --- ### Floor (15 minutes): Set up stations before class starts. Each station will last approximately 3.75 minutes before switching to the next station. | **Station** | **Equipment** | **Execution** | **Focus** | |------------------------|-----------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------| | Handstand Step-Downs | Wall | - Kick up to handstand
- Control step down one foot at a time | Core strength, Balance | | Front Walkovers | Wedge | - Kick to handstand
- Bridge down and step out | Controlled descent, Strong leg push | | Back Handspring Drills | Panel mat | - Sit back into hollow jump
- Push through shoulders
- Snap legs over | Fast snapdown, Arm coordination | | Press Handstand Holds | Floor | - Pike or straddle press to handstand
- Hold for as long as possible | Shoulder strength, Core balance | --- ### Conditioning & Cool Down (5 minutes): - 10 V-ups - 10 Push-ups - 10 Squats - Shoulder stretch - Pike stretch - Deep breathing exercises
You are an expert gymnastics coach.
Create a 30-minute gymnastics practice plan for beginner girls.

### 30-Minute Beginner Recreational Girls Practice Plan #### Warm Up (5 minutes): - 10 jumping jacks - Arm circles forward and backward - Pike stretch - Shoulder stretch - Gentle bridge holds --- #### Vault (7 minutes): Set up stations before class starts. Each station will last approximately 3.5 minutes before switching. | **Station** | **Equipment** | **Execution** | **Focus** | |------------------------|-----------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------------------| | Sprint Drills | Vault runway | - Slow, controlled run
- Focus on knee lift | Proper running technique | | Hurdle Drills | Vault table, springboard | - Run, hurdle onto springboard
- Focus on form | Building hurdle technique | --- #### Bars (8 minutes): | **Station** | **Equipment** | **Execution** | **Focus** | |------------------------|-----------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------------------| | Kip Progressions | Bar, resistance band | - Pull to hollow hang
- Kip swings with resistance band | Core and shoulder engagement| | Cast to Handstand | Bar | - Start in front support
- Small casts building up to handstand | Core control, arm push strength | --- #### Floor (8 minutes): | **Station** | **Equipment** | **Execution** | **Focus** | |------------------------|-----------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------------------| | Handstand Step-Downs | Wall | - Kick up to handstand
- Control step down one foot at a time | Core strength, balance | | Front Walkovers | Wedge | - Kick to handstand
- Bridge down and step out | Controlled descent, leg push| --- #### Conditioning & Cool Down (2 minutes): - 5 V-ups - 5 Push-ups - 5 Squats - Shoulder stretch - Pike stretch - Deep breathing exercises
You are an expert gymnastics coach.
Create a 40-minute gymnastics practice plan for intermediate girls.

### 40-Minute Intermediate Recreational Girls Practice Plan #### Warm Up (6 minutes): - 15 jumping jacks - Arm circles forward and backward - Pike stretch - Shoulder stretch - Bridge with 5 rocks and 5 kicks --- #### Vault (10 minutes): | **Station** | **Equipment** | **Execution** | **Focus** | |------------------------|-----------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------------------| | Sprint Drills | Vault runway | - Fast, high knee run
- Arm drive coordination | Proper running technique | | Hurdle to Handstand | Wedge, vault table | - Run, hurdle onto springboard
- Kick to handstand | Power in hurdle, handstand control| | Handstand Flatbacks | Vault table, mat | - Run, hurdle onto springboard
- Handstand on vault table | Handstand shape, safe landing| --- #### Bars (12 minutes): | **Station** | **Equipment** | **Execution** | **Focus** | |------------------------|-----------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------------------| | Kip Progressions | Bar, resistance band | - Pull to hollow hang
- Kip swings with resistance band | Core and shoulder engagement| | Cast to Handstand | Bar | - Start in front support
- Small casts building up to handstand | Core control, arm push strength | | Glide Swings | Low bar | - Hollow body swing
- Extend legs forward and backward | Swing technique, core engagement| --- #### Floor (12 minutes): | **Station** | **Equipment** | **Execution** | **Focus** | |------------------------|-----------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------------------| | Handstand Step-Downs | Wall | - Kick up to handstand
- Control step down one foot at a time | Core strength, balance | | Front Walkovers | Wedge | - Kick to handstand
- Bridge down and step out | Controlled descent, strong leg push| | Back Handspring Drills | Panel mat | - Sit back into hollow jump
- Push through shoulders | Fast snapdown, arm coordination| --- #### Conditioning & Cool Down (4 minutes): - 10 V-ups - 10 Push-ups - 10 Squats - Shoulder stretch - Pike stretch - Deep breathing exercises

Create a 50-minute gymnastics practice plan for advanced girls.

### 50-Minute Advanced Recreational Girls Practice Plan #### Warm Up (7 minutes): - 20 jumping jacks - Arm circles forward and backward - Pike stretch - Shoulder stretch - Bridge with 10 rocks and 10 kicks - Dynamic leg swings --- #### Vault (12 minutes): | **Station** | **Equipment** | **Execution** | **Focus** | |------------------------|-----------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------------------| | Sprint Drills | Vault runway | - Fast, high knee run
- Arm drive coordination | Proper running technique | | Hurdle to Handstand | Wedge, vault table | - Run, hurdle onto springboard
- Kick to handstand | Power in hurdle, handstand control| | Handstand Flatbacks | Vault table, mat | - Run, hurdle onto springboard
- Handstand on vault table | Handstand shape, safe landing| | Block Jumps | Springboard, block | - Jump onto block with feet together
- Stick landing | Body control, leg power | --- #### Bars (15 minutes): | **Station** | **Equipment** | **Execution** | **Focus** | |------------------------|-----------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------------------| | Kip Progressions | Bar, resistance band | - Pull to hollow hang
- Kip swings with resistance band | Core and shoulder engagement| | Cast to Handstand | Bar | - Start in front support
- Small casts building up to handstand | Core control, arm push strength| | Glide Swings | Low bar | - Hollow body swing
- Extend legs forward and backward | Swing technique, core engagement| | Tap Swings | High bar | - Swing with controlled hollow-to-arch transitions | Rhythm, shoulder extension | --- #### Floor (15 minutes): | **Station** | **Equipment** | **Execution** | **Focus** | |------------------------|-----------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------------------| | Handstand Step-Downs | Wall | - Kick up to handstand
- Control step down one foot at a time | Core strength, balance | | Front Walkovers | Wedge | - Kick to handstand
- Bridge down and step out | Controlled descent, strong leg push| | Back Handspring Drills | Panel mat | - Sit back into hollow jump
- Push through shoulders | Fast snapdown, arm coordination| | Press Handstand Holds | Floor | - Pike or straddle press to handstand
- Hold for as long as possible | Shoulder strength, core balance| --- #### Conditioning & Cool Down (6 minutes): - 10 V-ups - 10 Push-ups - 10 Squats - Shoulder stretch - Pike stretch - Deep breathing exercises
You are an expert gymnastics coach.
Create a 60-minute gymnastics practice plan for beginner girls.

### 60-Minute Beginner Recreational Girls Practice Plan #### Warm Up (8 minutes): - 20 jumping jacks - Arm circles forward and backward - Pike stretch - Shoulder stretch - Bridge with 5 rocks and 5 kicks - Hip circles --- #### Vault (12 minutes): | **Station** | **Equipment** | **Execution** | **Focus** | |------------------------|-----------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------------------| | Sprint Drills | Vault runway | - Slow, controlled run
- Focus on knee lift | Proper running technique | | Hurdle Drills | Vault table, springboard | - Run, hurdle onto springboard
- Focus on form | Building hurdle technique | | Block Jumps | Springboard, block | - Jump onto block with feet together
- Stick landing | Body control, leg power | --- #### Bars (15 minutes): | **Station** | **Equipment** | **Execution** | **Focus** | |------------------------|-----------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------------------| | Kip Progressions | Bar, resistance band | - Pull to hollow hang
- Kip swings with resistance band | Core and shoulder engagement| | Cast to Handstand | Bar | - Start in front support
- Small casts building up to handstand | Core control, arm push strength| | Glide Swings | Low bar | - Hollow body swing
- Extend legs forward and backward | Swing technique, core engagement| --- #### Floor (18 minutes): | **Station** | **Equipment** | **Execution** | **Focus** | |------------------------|-----------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------------------| | Handstand Step-Downs | Wall | - Kick up to handstand
- Control step down one foot at a time | Core strength, balance | | Front Walkovers | Wedge | - Kick to handstand
- Bridge down and step out | Controlled descent, leg push| | Back Handspring Drills | Panel mat | - Sit back into hollow jump
- Push through shoulders | Fast snapdown, arm coordination| | Press Handstand Holds | Floor | - Pike or straddle press to handstand

- Arm drive coordination | Proper running technique | | Hurdle to Handstand | Wedge, vault table | - Run, hurdle onto springboard
- Kick to handstand | Power in hurdle, handstand control| | Handstand Flatbacks | Vault table, mat | - Run, hurdle onto springboard
- Handstand on vault table | Handstand shape, safe landing| | Block Jumps | Springboard, block | - Jump onto block with feet together
- Stick landing | Body control, leg power | --- #### Bars (25 minutes): | **Station** | **Equipment** | **Execution** | **Focus** | |------------------------|-----------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------------------| | Kip Progressions | Bar, resistance band | - Pull to hollow hang
- Kip swings with resistance band | Core and shoulder engagement| | Cast to Handstand | Bar | - Start in front support
- Small casts building up to handstand | Core control, arm push strength| | Glide Swings | Low bar | - Hollow body swing
- Extend legs forward and backward | Swing technique, core engagement| | Tap Swings | High bar | - Swing with controlled hollow-to-arch transitions | Rhythm, shoulder extension | --- #### Floor (30 minutes): | **Station** | **Equipment** | **Execution** | **Focus** | |------------------------|-----------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------------------| | Handstand Step-Downs | Wall | - Kick up to handstand
- Control step down one foot at a time | Core strength, balance | | Front Walkovers | Wedge | - Kick to handstand
- Bridge down and step out | Controlled descent, strong leg push| | Back Handspring Drills | Panel mat | - Sit back into hollow jump
- Push through shoulders | Fast snapdown, arm coordination| | Press Handstand Holds | Floor | - Pike or straddle press to handstand
- Hold for as long as possible | Shoulder strength, core balance| | Roundoff to Back Handspring | Panel mat | - Start in roundoff position
- Snap legs through to back handspring | Strong leg push, arm snap | --- #### Conditioning & Cool Down (10 minutes): - 20 V-ups - 20 Push-ups - 20 Squats - Shoulder stretch - Pike stretch - Deep breathing exercises

### 120-Minute Advanced Recreational Girls Practice Plan #### Warm Up (15 minutes): - 30 jumping jacks - Arm circles forward and backward - Pike stretch - Shoulder stretch - Bridge with 15 rocks and 15 kicks - Dynamic leg swings - 5-minute jog or run --- #### Vault (25 minutes): | **Station** | **Equipment** | **Execution** | **Focus** | |------------------------|-----------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------------------| | Sprint Drills | Vault runway | - Fast, high knee run
- Arm drive coordination | Proper running technique | | Hurdle to Handstand | Wedge, vault table | - Run, hurdle onto springboard
- Kick to handstand | Power in hurdle, handstand control| | Handstand Flatbacks | Vault table, mat | - Run, hurdle onto springboard
- Handstand on vault table | Handstand shape, safe landing| | Block Jumps | Springboard, block | - Jump onto block with feet together
- Stick landing | Body control, leg power | | Yurchenko Drills | Vault table, mat | - Approach, roundoff entry, block on vault table | Technique for Yurchenko vault| --- #### Bars (40 minutes): | **Station** | **Equipment** | **Execution** | **Focus** | |------------------------|-----------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------------------| | Kip Progressions | Bar, resistance band | - Pull to hollow hang
- Kip swings with resistance band | Core and shoulder engagement| | Cast to Handstand | Bar | - Start in front support
- Small casts building up to handstand | Core control, arm push strength| | Glide Swings | Low bar | - Hollow body swing
- Extend legs forward and backward | Swing technique, core engagement| | Tap Swings | High bar | - Swing with controlled hollow-to-arch transitions | Rhythm, shoulder extension | | Giant Swings | High bar | - Swing through with control
- Perform giant circles | Extension, rhythm, and shoulder strength| --- #### Floor (45 minutes): | **Station** | **Equipment** | **Execution** | **Focus** | |------------------------|-----------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------------------| | Handstand Step-Downs | Wall | - Kick up to handstand
- Control step down one foot at a time | Core strength, balance | | Front Walkovers | Wedge | - Kick to handstand
- Bridge down and step out | Controlled descent, strong leg push| | Back Handspring Drills | Panel mat | - Sit back into hollow jump
- Push through shoulders | Fast snapdown, arm coordination| | Press Handstand Holds | Floor | - Pike or straddle press to handstand
- Hold for as long as possible | Shoulder strength, core balance| | Roundoff to Back Handspring | Panel mat | - Start in roundoff position
- Snap legs through to back handspring | Strong leg push, arm snap | | Back Layout Drills | Floor, mats | - Start in back handspring
- Tuck legs and snap into back layout | Air awareness, body position| --- #### Conditioning & Cool Down (15 minutes): - 30 V-ups - 30 Push-ups - 30 Squats - Shoulder stretch - Pike stretch - Deep breathing exercises - Full-body stretch and relaxation
